subject: {{sender.contact_name}}'s satisfaction note is taking longer than usual to process

rows.text: {{sender.contact_name}} has signed the satisfaction note, however, it's taking Kanda longer than usual to verify the document. This can happen if we can't get hold of the customer or they have raised an issue about the works. We'll get in touch with you if there is a problem; if you don't hear from us then we're just trying to contact your customer.
What do I need to do?
rows.subtext: Nothing, just sit tight. We will get in touch if we need anything - our team can't share anymore information at this point.
